resources.string: Welcome to TextSpam. To start spamming, first enter the message in the Message field. Then the amount of texts to send in the Frequency field. Finally add the recipient contact number(without hyphens) in the Recipient field. When you do add the number, make sure to click Add so that it appears on the list below. Once you are content with the information, click Send. To clear individual numbers just long click on the entry until it disappears, or press clear all to remove all recipients!!!
Please enter a frequency to send
This is where the message to send goes.
This is the amount of times the message will be sent.
Put the contact number to send to here. The field will suggest contacts you already have
Click this button to add the contact to the sending list.
Here is where the recipients of the message will be listed. Click and hold to clear a recipient.
Click this button to see all your contacts. Click on a contact to add.
Click this button to send the current message to the listed contacts.
Click here to remove all recipients.
Click here to add the conversation that you created to the conversation menu for quick and easy access.
Click here to access the tutorial again.
